월 말일까지 확인되지 않으면
수익금이 다음 달로 이월 됩니다.

Home.MobileDescription:

PennameDescription2.label: 필명 변경이 있을 경우, 로그인 후 마이페이지 → 홈에서 변경 가능합니다.

agreeAllCopyright: I have checked and confirmed all copyright information above, and agree to take liability for any situation that may arise due to falsification.

basicDetail.introductionBody:
Please introduce yourself and your product!
If the product is a set or a series, please list other linked products as well.
Once the product is open for sale, our ACON editor will link all corresponding sales pages for you.
basicDetail.contentBody:
Please describe your product with text and images!
Users are more likely to purchase projects with detailed information.
Images must be uploaded directly from your files, not by copying from other sites or pages.
For 3D models, we recommend including both original texture mode and hidden line mode images from various angles.

Dynamic components are also an attractive element to your model!
If they are included, please describe in detail.

cancelModal:
⚠️ 업로드가 완료되지 않은 상태로 저장할 경우,
파일이 저장되지 않을 수 있습니다.
그래도 저장하시겠습니까?

common.fileUploadLimit: 10MB 이하의 파일만 업로드 할 수 있습니다.

completedRequest:
성공적으로 신청 되었습니다.
검토 완료 후 이메일을 통하여
안내드릴 예정입니다.
감사합니다 :D

extraSourceText: └ 상업적으로 이용이 가능한 타 무료 외부 소스를 사용하였습니다.

noModelFile: 프로젝트 및 작품 파일이 존재하지 않습니다.

payExtraSourcePlaceholder: e.g. wood table (source: oooo.com), wallpaper texture (source: oooo.com)
preferredSearchKeywordDescription: Please separate each keyword with a comma(,).
priceDescription: 작가님께서 희망하시는, 구매자 분들에게 최종판매될 가격대를 기입해주세요.
projectAndFileDescription: 프로젝트 및 작품의 파일을 zip으로 묶어서 업로드해주세요.
refernceRightText: - 구매 작품에 저작권자 및 출처 표시 는 의무사항입니다.
representativeImageAndFileDescription:
고화질 대표이미지 1개, 서브이미지 3개(1920 x 1080px 이상 권장)와 작품의 파일을
contact@acon3d.com 으로 공유해주세요.
공유 시 메일 제목은 "작성자 / 프로젝트 제목" (ex. 코니 / 아늑한 테라스와 정원)으로 부탁드립니다.
representativeImageDescription: 문자/자막이 없는 대표 이미지를 업로드해주세요. 본문 내용 속 이미지와 중복되어도 괜찮습니다.
requestReviewCompletedModalContents: Once your project is open for sale, we will give you a notice via email in 2-7 business days (Mon-Fri). Thank you for your patience.
requestReviewCompletedModalContents2:
After review, your project will be introduced on www.acon3d.com.
If you need to revise the content, please send an email to contact@acon3d.com.

oldSalesRecordsInfo: This page will be operational until July 4, 2024, replacing the newly established Sales records.

본문 내용 속 이미지와 중복되어도 괜찮습니다.

settleTable.appliedWorkNote: Companies/teams are restricted to using the purchased project in one artwork only. We provide ACON artists records of company/team purchases and their artworks.

excelAllDownload: Download full brand sales history Excel

isNotExcelFile: Only excel files can be uploaded.
fileUpTo1MB: Files larger than 1 MB cannot be uploaded.
setGoodsSuccess: All product registrations have been successfully completed.

unsupported.outdated: ACON does not support this browser and is optimized for viewing in Chrome.
unsupported.recommend: ACON is optimized for viewing in Chrome.

product.editMessageDescription: Briefly describe the updated features to your editor.

cancelEditRequestMessage:

cancelRequestMessage:

isCancelRequestConfirmButton:

requestReviewCompletedModalContents3: Your project will be open for sale in 2-7 business days (Mon-Fri), and you will receive an email notice. Thank you for your patience.

signupPage.passwordCondition: Password needs to be 8-16 characters, and must include characters, numbers, and symbols.
signupPage.emailNotification:
Communicate with ACON via the email used as your ID.
Please use the email you are actually using as your ID.
signupPage.emailAuthenticated: Your email address has been verified.
signupPage.creatorNameNotification: If you don't provide the brand in another language, it will be translated based on English.

placeholder.projectReference: Please attach a link to your own project for review.
placeholder.projectReference2: If the link is a Google Drive, please check the access settings.
placeholder.snsUrl: Our official account will promote your SNS posts. (Twitter, Instagram, Weibo)
placeholder.name: Please enter your full name in English.

signupPage.name: Name
signupPage.sentEmail: Verification code has been sent to your email.
signupPage.onFinishConfirmMessage: Have you entered all information correctly?

policy.agreementWithPrivacy: ACON PARTNER HUB Terms of Service & Personal Information Privacy Policy
policy.policyDescription01: I have read all contents of Terms of Service and Personal Information Privacy Policy, and agree to act faithfully in accordance with the agreement, terms and conditions.
policy.policyDescription02: I have read all contents of Terms of Service and Personal Information Privacy Policy, and agree to act faithfully in accordance with the agreement, terms and conditions.

login.title: Sign in now
login.errorMessage1: Please check that your username and/or password are correct.
login.errorMessage2: Your user information could not be found.
login.errorMessage3: You attemped invalid login frequently. Login will be blocked for 15 minutes.
login.errorMessage4: You attemped invalid login frequently. Login will be blocked for 15 minutes.

pleaseEnterWarehouseSource: Please list the warehouse sources used in your project.
pleaseEnterOtherSource: Please list the external sources used in your project.
pleaseEnterRealLogo: Please answer that the product includes an actual logo/trademark.

signupModal.warning:
If you move the page,
what you've written so far will disappear.

Would you still like to move?

store.referenceLinkPlaceholder: Please attach a link to your own project for review.

checkEditMessage: Entering modifications is required. Please enter the "Update Features"

dateRange.alert: The start date cannot be greater than the end date.

document.checkSketchUpContent:
Please make sure SketchUp files(.skp) are
saved in version 2013 or 2017.
Files in higher versions will be rejected.
document.ProductUpdateInformation: If you select the area you want to update the product, it will be changed to an updateable state.

adult.label: For Adult
adult.notice:
Please refer to the ACON adult product guidelines.
If it goes against the guidelines, the product registration may be refused or rejected.
adult.modalDescription:
You will register the product for adult.
If the registration is completed as a product for adult,
the product will only be exposed to the buyers
who has been confirmed to be an adult at ACON3D.

title.label: Title
title.placeholder: The title must be 30 characters in maximum.
title.information: Please write the title concisely including all key elements of the product.

price.enterprisePlaceholder:
Start selling enterprise
and get more earnings!
price.enterpriseAgreement: I understand and agree about enterprise sales of this products.

limit.title: Request to change the price
limit.description:
The price of the product can only be set at more than 1 dollar.
Please check the price of the product again.

warning.floor: You can only set the price in dollars.

price.notice: It will be registered as a free product.

notice.sketchUp: SketchUp files(.skp) must be saved in version 2013 or 2017. Files in higher versions will be rejected.
notice.lecture: Only video files with the extensions .mp4, .avi, .mov, .wmv, .asf, .mkv, or .flv can be uploaded. Please make sure to check the extension.
notice.fileName: The filename must be written in English, and if the filename contains the name of an existing brand, it will be rejected.

file.information: There is no limit in file size. However, the file may take a long time to upload and buyers may experience difficulty in downloading the product.
file.uploadDescription:
Upload only one compressed file.
The file must not contain another compressed file within itself:
incorrect information on file details, formats, or compatible software may be displayed.

notice.policy: As ACON consistently provides copyright policies, if copyright-related information is separately included in the product's detailed description, it will be rejected.

copyright.isOriginal:
Did you create all sources by yourself, including props, fonts, textures, images?
And do you also create everything yourself without copying the actual brand/product or using AI?

warehouse.question: Please list the SketchUp 3D Warehouse assets in detail, with the original source.
warehouse.additional: Please list the SketchUp 3D Warehouse assets in detail.
warehouse.example: e.g. Truck model among all vehicles
warehouse.notice: The Partner is liable for situations caused due to false information.

commercialSource.question: Does the product include any other free-license or license-purchased external assets available for commercial use?
commercialSource.additional: Please list the external assets in detail, with the original source.
commercialSource.notice: The Partner is liable for situations caused due to false information.

realLogo.question: Does the product include existing brand logo or trademark?
realLogo.notice:
Even if the logo/trademark is modified from the original, the copyright/trademark owner may still raise an issue.
Please make changes so as not to infringe on copyright/trademark as possible.

copyright.warning: The Partner is liable for all situations caused by falsification of the above copyrights information.

image.mainImageBallonDescription: Displayed as thumbnail and main image on the product page.
image.subImageBallonDescription: Displayed when the mouse cursor is on the thumbnail.
image.information: Select the best presented image of your product to grab buyer attention. Illustrations or rendered/corrected images are recommended.
image.notice:
Image Requirements
 • JPG, PNG, JPEG format
 • 1280*787 or higher resolution
 • 10Mb or less
image.noTypo: if the Thumbnail included text, it will be rejected.

content.head: Product Introduction
content.notice: If any personal contact information or URLs to external websites are included, they may be edited or rejected during the review process without notification.
content.information1: In [Product Introduction], briefly introduce yourself and the product. For package/bundle products, please list the full set or included product titles. Your MD will link the relevant products during review.
content.information2: In [Product Contents], please describe the product in detail. Provide calibrated/original/line images, as well as user instructions and convenient features. If either the image or the description is missing, it will be rejected.

categories.title: Categories
categories.subject: Subject
categories.notice: If an inappropriate category is selected, it may be edited during review.

tags.title: Tag
tags.notice: To facilitate product exposure, tags are only allowed within the registered ones. You may list up to 10 tags. Keywords irrelevant to the product may be edited or deleted during review.
tags.notFound: Sorry, There is no search result.
tags.tip1: Please check the spelling of the word.
tags.tip2: Try searching with an another word.

document.TemporarySaveDescription:
Do you want to temporarily save
what you have written so far?

Once the temporary save is completed,
you can continue to fill it out at any time.

notice.title: Price Update Guidelines
notice.description:
The next price update is available
after 30 days.

Frequent price updates
can reduce the Partner’s reliability.

warning.title: Unable to Update Price
warning.description:
The price update is not possible 30 days
after the date of the final price update.

Please understand that it is a policy to
prevent a decrease in reliability due to
frequent price updates.

document.requestBubble: After you've been approved Seller Application Information, you can registration request.

industries.title: Industry
industries.information: Select the industry you expect to use. You can choose duplicate.

fileUpload.clickOrDrag: Click here or drag and drop file.

registration.title: Product Registration Request
registration.description:
Would you like to request the product registration
according to what you wrote?

Once the product registration request
has been completed,
you will not be able to modify what you have written.
registration.descriptionWithopenrun:
Do you want to proceed with product registration and apply for the Open Run promotion with the entered information?

Once product registration is completed, you won't be able to modify the provided details or your promotion request.

update.title: Product Update Details
update.description:
Please describe the update in {{selected}}.

The more detailed and clear
the product update details are written,
the smoother the request is reflected and updated.
update.placeholder: Please enter the Product Update Details.

applyOpenrun.title: OPENRUN Promotion
applyOpenrun.tooltip: If priced at $40 or higher, you can apply for a OPENRUN promotion.
applyOpenrun.infomation: For enterprise sales, promotions do not apply.
applyOpenrun.warning: If you apply for an OPENRUN promotion within another promotion or event, it may result in an error due to overlapping discounts. Please refrain from applying.

The sum of the sales amount of one product.
ㆍ[Retail price] - [Partner-charged discount] = Total

item.noItemMessage: There are no products sold during the selected period.

settlementDate.title: Settlement confirmation date
settlementDate.tooltip: The settlement confirmation date is 7 days after the sale.

notice.line1: We will settle the sales from the 1st to the end of the month based on the “settlement confirmation date,” which is 7 days after the sale date. Please refer to the “Settlement Records” for more information.
notice.line2: Please note that the “Partner-charged discount ” is not applied for transactions before Jan 1, 2023, and only the “Retail price” is available. (Same amount may differ from the actual amount)

snackbar.text1: Sales Records menu has been updated.

noInfo.text: Please enter the settlement information to settle the sales.

modal.content:
For changes in Contract information,
please send us an email to
contact@acon3d.com

notice.line1: We will settle the sales from the 1st to the end of the month based on the “settlement confirmation date,” which is 7 days after the sale date, in order to ensure compliance with the right to a refund under the Consumer Protection Law.
notice.line2: Settlement amount will be deposited quarterly in your registered account, but the settlement amount will be calculated in 7 working days every next month.
notice.line3: Depending on the transaction currency, exchange rate for settlement will be different. Exchange rate for USD($) sales will be calculated by average exchange rate in the month.
notice.line4: The menu is for reference only and cannot be used for tax filing or documentation purposes.
notice.line5: The “Download details in Excel” is also for reference, due to rounding and calculation method differences, the total amount per transaction and the final calculation could be different each other.

expectation.label: Expected
expectation.description: * It is a temporary exchange rate and an estimated amount, which may differ from the actual settlement amount.

settlementConfirmationPeriod.label: Settlement confirmation period
settlementConfirmationPeriod.tooltip: The settlement confirmation date is 7 days after the sale.

additionalSettlementAssessment.label: Adjustment settlement amount (E)
additionalSettlementAssessment.tooltip:
After discussing with partners, the amount will be
settled more or less based on previous settlement.

list.noItemMessage:
There are no settlement records
(If it’s the 1st day of the month at midnight, data may be processing. Please check again in an hour)

snackbar.text1: Settlement Records has been newly added.

section01.title: Thank you for becoming a Partner
section01.content:
As a reliable supporter of creators,
ACON warmly welcomes you - our new Partner.
We offer you a selection of partnerships for you to choose
accordingly to the sales strategy you wish to go for.

exclusive.title: Exclusive
exclusive.description01: More settlements available from lower fees
exclusive.description03: Certified badges shown for Exclusive Partners
exclusive.description04: Many more exclusive benefits to come
exclusive.description05: * Selling products in other online platforms or funding is not prohibited, but personal blogs and shops are okay to use for sales!

nonExclusive.title: Non-exclusive
nonExclusive.description01: Available to sell products in other platforms

section03.title:
ACON offers the following benefits
so that you can completely focus on your work!

section04.inquiry01: For more questions, please leave us an email to
